pageTitle: Celo: A platform for fast, secure, stable digital payments
pageDescription: Celo is an open platform that makes financial tools accessible to anyone with a mobile phone
pageHeader: Global payments infrastructure built for mobile
pageSubheader: Thousands of organizations and individuals are developing,  growing, and governing Celo: An open-source platform that enables anyone to build borderless applications
coverPhonesImage: Phones showing various deFi apps built on the Celo Platform
benefit1Text: A mobile-first approach that provides the opportunity to positively impact 5.6B smartphone owners globally
benefit2Text: Supported by a mission-aligned network of technologists, international NGOs, and organizations committed to building an inclusive financial system
benefit3Text: Technology innovations allow Celo to truly work across devices, carriers, & countries
twoMoneyTitle: Digital money powered by a two asset system
cUSDinfo: cUSD (Celo Dollars) are a stable asset that follows the US Dollar. With cUSD, you can share money faster, cheaper, and more easily on your mobile phone.
CELOinfo: CELO is a utility and governance asset for the Celo community, which has a fixed supply and variable value. With CELO, you can help shape the direction of the Celo Platform.
flowersTitle: A Gift of Heart: For Value Flowers
flowersTitleMobile:
A Gift of Heart:
For Value Flowers
flowersSubtitle: Art inspired by the spirit and mission of Celo

involve.subtitle: Ways to get involved with the Celo ecosystem
involve.title: Choose your path with Celo

paths.name: Build
paths.title: Develop mobile dApps on Celo
paths.text: Explore, build, and ship ideas for your community using Celoâ€™s developer tools.

paths.name: Grow
paths.title: Scale your business on Celo
paths.text: Have a product, users, and traction? Or a tangible solution for the Celo ecosystem? Take your business to the next level with funding through the Celo Grants Program or the Polychain Ecosystem VC Fund.

paths.name: Validate
paths.title: Operate and secure the network
paths.text: Participate as a validator in Celo's proof of stake consensus protocol.

paths.name: Partner
paths.title: Join the Alliance for Prosperity
paths.text: Take action to solve real-world problems with a growing community of mission-aligned organizations around the world.

paths.name: Connect
paths.title: Join the Celo movement
paths.text: A place to belong with fellow developers, designers, dreamers, and doers. Connect with the Celo community to share your gifts of prosperity.

paths.name: Work
paths.title: Work with value
paths.text: Explore opportunities at cLabs, the team that initially shaped Celo and a member of the Alliance for Prosperity. cLabs has offices in Berlin, Buenos Aires, and San Francisco, with contributors around the world.
